# 60 Minute Sites

> Professional websites for small businesses, live in 60 minutes. $100 setup + $50/month.

## What We Do

60 Minute Sites creates professional, conversion-optimized websites for small businesses and local service providers. We specialize in fast deployment without sacrificing quality.

## Pricing

- Setup: $100 one-time
- Monthly: $50/month
- Annual: $500/year (save $100)

## Industries We Serve

Plumbers, Electricians, HVAC, Construction, Roofing, Landscaping, Cleaning, Pest Control, Salons, Barbers, Spas, Massage Therapists, Fitness Studios, Yoga Studios, Restaurants, Cafes, Real Estate Agents, Photographers, Dentists, Veterinarians, Lawyers, Accountants, Insurance Agents, Auto Shops, Architects, Interior Designers, Event Planners, Musicians, Tutors, Therapists, Consultants, and more.

## Key Features

- Live in 60 minutes
- Mobile-optimized
- SEO-ready
- Google Business integration
- Contact forms
- Online booking options
- Professional templates
